dict.acceptation: 衣物和装备；成套用品；配套元件；
（为特定活动而）使某人装备起来；

sent.orig: AbstractObjective:To explore the exPression of human c-kit recePtor protCin(c-kit R, CDl l7) in acute leukemia (AL).
sent.trans: [目的]本研究主要探讨c-kit受体(c-kit R,CD117）在急性白血病(AL)中的表达及其临床意义。

sent.orig: Both these cells express VLA-4, VLA-5 integrins and the SCF receptor (c-kit).
sent.trans: CD34~+细胞和Mo7e细胞高表达VLA-4、VLA-5整合素及SCF受体c-kit,是研究SCF／c-kit信号活化整合素受体机制的理想细胞模型。

sent.orig: KIT expression was associated with advanced disease and with decreased incidence of bone metastases.
sent.trans: KIT的表达情况与疾病晚期和减少骨转移的发病率有关。

sent.orig: RESULTS: KIT expression was observed in 149 of 204 tumour tissues (73%).
sent.trans: 结果：在204例肿瘤组织中有149例中有KIT表达（73%）。

sent.orig: To isolate and purify c-Kit+lin-cells from murine bone marrow by magnetic activated cell sorting (MACS).
sent.trans: 目的：利用免疫磁性细胞分选系统分离纯化骨髓衍生肝干细胞亚群c-Kit+lin-。
